file.path: D:\TORRENT\________COMPLETED\Epub Collection#8(32Skulls)\Becky Lyn Rickman - Grimm's Last Fairy Tale (epub).epub
file.name: Becky Lyn Rickman - Grimm's Last Fairy Tale (epub).epub

tika.dc.description:
Margaret Naomi Austen lived a disenchanted life, free from the pretense that the world held any magic for her. Her only respite from the drudgery of life was the hours she spent at Binding Love, a small used book store that relied on its online sales and seldom saw other human beings. She loved being surrounded by the brilliance of these now dead authors, statesmen, humorists, and poets. She loved her life of anonymity and winced when her phone would ring and disrupt her solitude. Her roommates, three cat known affectionately as Mr. Bingley, Mr. Darcy, and Colonel Brandon, provided her with argument-free companionship. 

Her quiet life was one day disrupted by some cryptic messages, which continued until Maggie could no longer discern whether she was finally relinquishing her life to the mid-life madness that had been looming over her for so many years or whether there might actually be a little magic left in the world.
Trying to convince herself that she could not and did not have a secret admirer, she is finally visited by the spirit of a man she had for so long held dear--a literary giant whose works she had turned to whenever life became more than she could handle.
Why was he there and what did he have to do with her future?
Find the magical answers for yourself in this love story that transcends time and breaks down the barriers that separate the living from the moved on.
You will find yourself believing once again.
